title: What would the world be like today if Mars was hospitable to life and had its own intelligent race native to it? - Quora

response.answer_text: Well…If humanity was aware that Mars was habitable…and had its own intelligent race upon it…real “Martians”, we would probably be having the major nations of Earth building up our defensive capabilities to protect our own planet from attack…as, to be prudent, that would be the safest thing to do…should the Martians prove hostile. After all, H.G. Wells wrote his famous novel “The War of the Worlds” about just that possibility…a Martian invasion of Earth…and several cinematic treatments of Wells’ novel have been made since he wrote it…further cementing that possibility in the popular mind. So there would be a massive build-up of Terrestrial spaceflight, and defensive, capability…directed against the possibility of an interplanetary attack from Mars. Further robot explorations of the “red planet” would also be stepped up…hoping to learn more about the planet…and perhaps its inhabitants. A manned mission to the planet would, and probably should, be deferred until more is learned about the Martians…their technology…etc. The major religions would have some major “re-thinking” of their ideas and beliefs to do if extraterrestrial life is proven to exist on Mars…and the major nations would have to step up their co-operative efforts to prepare the Earth to be able to meet with aliens from Mars in the near future…which could be very dangerous if humanity is not better prepared to do so!

We would colonize it, get the vast majority of them killed with our germs, take their natural resources and land, take their women as wives and use the men as forced labor. Later they would rebel and successfully kick us off because the vast majority of humans will become sympathetic to their cause. Then later they would build up their military and we would be at war with them on and off for the next thousand years. Then later some interstellar aliens would invade our solar system and we would team up to fight them off. Up vote if you would like to see this made into a book.
